programme.title: Monster High Adventures of the Ghoul Squad
programme.desc: Get ready for a voltageous time! The ghouls are back like you’ve never seen them before in this action-packed adventure! Draculaura, Frankie, Clawdeen, and their ghoulfriends combine their wits and monsteriffic abilities as they travel to exotic locations, solve spine-tingling mysteries, and rescue monsters who are hiding from a world that fears and doesn’t understand them. So how do you track these missing monsters down and bring them back to their new home at Monster High? You call The Ghoul Squad!

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Fun-packed adventures with your favorite ghouls from Monster High.

programme.title: Barbie Summer Adventure
programme.desc: Barbie, Barbie & her sisters are excited for the first day of summer break, but things don't go according to plan! Things take an unexpected twist and turn into a wild adventure filled with fashion, hair styling, ice cream messes, & more!

programme.title: Barbie Dream Vacation
programme.desc: After the Extras tell Brooklyn, Malibu, and her sisters about their amazing vacation to Imagination Bay, the crew takes the Dreamboat for a vacation! With the help of a riddle, the dolls realize they can use their imaginations to create anything they want on the island like a confetti pool or a giant piece of cake!

programme.title: Barbie Dream Magic
programme.desc: Chelsea thinks the only way she can have fun is by spending her Saturday with her new camper & the cool guitar it came with. But when she hurts her wrist and is put on bedrest, she’ll learn that’s not true!

programme.title: Barbie Life in the City
programme.desc: Join me, Barbie "Brooklyn" Roberts, for my exciting new digital diary about New York City!

programme.title: Monster High: Electrified
programme.desc: When Clawdeen dreams of opening a salon made for monsters and normies, Frankie has the perfect place - an abandoned power station outside town. But the idea sparks negative voltage when Moanica plots to ruin the whole thing and replace the celebration with something a little more... shocking!

programme.title: Monster High: Freaky Fusion
programme.desc: When the ghouls travel back in time to learn about Frankie's scaritage, they run into trouble when the time machine accidentally fuses eight of the ghouls into four hybrid monsters! Get ready for a clash of fang and fur!

programme.title: Monster High Adventures of the Ghoul Squad
programme.desc: Get ready for a voltageous time! The ghouls are back like you’ve never seen them before in this action-packed adventure! Draculaura, Frankie, Clawdeen, and their ghoulfriends combine their wits and monsteriffic abilities as they travel to exotic locations, solve spine-tingling mysteries, and rescue monsters who are hiding from a world that fears and doesn’t understand them. So how do you track these missing monsters down and bring them back to their new home at Monster High? You call The Ghoul Squad!

programme.title: Barbie Doll Adventures
programme.desc: Welcome to Doll World! A beautiful place where all dolls live and play in harmony with a shared goal of inspiring future generations of girls to dream big and be anything! When the very first and most iconic Barbie fashion doll is missing, Barbie & Barbie set out on an exciting adventure to find the missing outfit!

programme.title: Barbie Life in the City
programme.desc: Join me, Barbie "Brooklyn" Roberts, for my exciting new digital diary about New York City!

programme.title: Enchantimals: Finding Home
programme.desc: Meet the Enchantimals, a group of lovable girls who share a bond with their animal besties. In “Finding Home,” things get a bit wild when the girls discover a lost peacock Enchantimal and her bestie and decide to share their homes with the newcomers.

programme.title: Enchantimals Tales from Everwilde
programme.desc: Meet the Enchantimals™, a group of lovable girls who share a special bond with their animal besties. These amazing half-girl, half-animal friends live in a fantastical world where fun and adventure are around every corner, and sharing is our everything!

programme.title: American Girl Dolled Up!
programme.desc: Join Barbie and her friends as they embark on exciting adventures, tackle fun challenges, and share heartwarming moments. Whether they’re exploring new worlds, hosting fabulous parties, or learning valuable life lessons, each episode is packed with inspiration and entertainment. Dive into a world of imagination and creativity with Barbie and her beloved doll companions. Don’t miss out on the magic and fun!

programme.title: Pingu In The City
programme.desc: Join Pingu in his secret, whale-shaped funhouse in this engaging show, packed with sketches and facts about the amazing world of penguins.

programme.desc: Join Barbie and Chelsea on magical adventures in Dreamtopia, as they transform into mermaids, fly over Sweetville with fairy bubble wings and take a ride on the back of the Elephant King of Sparkle Mountain.

programme.title: Monster High: Great Scarrier Reef
programme.desc: When the ghouls get drawn into the school swimming pool which has been transformed into a portal, they find themselves transported to the Great Scarrier Reef and turned into mermaids! To enable the girls to return to reality, Lagoona must face her fears in the form of an old bully, win an underwater talent competition, and defeat the evil Posea, daughter of Poseidon.

programme.title: Monster High: Haunted
programme.desc: When Spectra goes back to her old ghost school to find out why Monster High is being haunted, the other ghouls use Boogey Sand to transform into ghosts so they can follow her. There, they die-scover that spirits are low because the Principal weighs students down with ghastly rules and detention chains. It's up to the ghouls and their new ghost friends to unbury the secrets of the ghost school!
